app.name: Bee TV
app.description: Bee TV provides a simple tile view presentation with integration to all major services along with regular updates.

app.name: Cuco TV
app.description:
Cuco TV provides a "one-click" style streaming app without the need to deal with choosing streaming sources.
Supports both Real-Debrid and Trakt.

app.name: CinemaHD
app.description: Cinema HD is another great alternative with a tile view interface with integration to all major services along with regular updates.

app.name: Film Plus
app.description: Film Plus is yet another great alternative with a tile view interface with integration to all major services along with regular updates.

app.name: Nova TV
app.description: Nova TV is another great alternative with a tile view interface with integration to all major services along with regular updates.

app.name: Happy Kids TV [Ad Free]
app.description:
Happy Kids TV is an excellent, kids friendly streaming service with multiple age categories and a simple UI for kids to navigate in.
TV Edition
